Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/power

What you'll find here: tools for power management on portables

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

apcmswitch-1.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1999-03-02
a remote power distribution unit that allows users to control power to connected devices (60134 bytes)
apmd-2.4.Announce (LSM entry) 1996-05-04
apmd-2.4.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-05-04
daemon for monitoring battery status via APM (16985 bytes)
apmx-0.00.tgz (LSM entry) 1996-02-04
monitors battery life under console or X (83480 bytes)
kbattery-0.1.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-10-14
Battery Status Indicator for Laptops (56353 bytes)
tkbattery-1.0.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-07-07
APM battery monitor, highly configurable (3380 bytes)
xbatcheck-1.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-10-14
battery and AC-line monitor for portables (5162 bytes)
xbatstat-0.5.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-01-02
display battery status in a X window (needs xforms) (99356 bytes)
xbattery-1.0.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1997-02-15
monitors AC power and battery status on portable computers (9244 bytes)
